name: SpellBoy (Heavy sheep games)
description:
Challenge your way through all the bosses.

4 bosses inspired by games made by the community!

Defeat all of them and prove to be the bravest spellcaster in the world!

Credits

Game design, programming and art

Luiz Gustavo Alves
